dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3143323I] Malicious website
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page in question any of the material that you claim is being infringed as of 3:18:32 p.m. (GMT-6). Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: Abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:Abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Monday, February 19, 2007 10:16 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3143323I] Malicious website ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Malicious website Added by system at Monday, Feb 19 2007 03:04 pm X-MailFrom: cenk.tasdan@turkcell.com.tr X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; 19 Feb 2007 21:04:22 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 19 Feb 2007 15:04:21 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 19 Feb 2007 23:03:27 +0200 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Received: from exhmbx01.turkcell.entp.tgc ([10.200.125.187]) by HUB3401.turkcell.entp.tgc with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.2499); Mon, 19 Feb 2007 23:03:27 +0200 Importance: normal Priority: normal X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.3790.2826 Content-Class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C75469.66043261" Disposition-Notification-To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Malicious website Subject: Malicious website Date: Mon, 19 Feb 2007 23:03:25 +0200 Message-ID: <8BE16B3790FCFE4A896F47F1DBD13FB701A5A579@exhmbx01.turkcell.entp.tgc> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Malicious website thread-index: AcdUaWWmtKdBG0i/Rryr7Mj8cbNs0A== From: To: Cc: , , X-OriginalArrivalTime: 19 Feb 2007 21:03:27.0255 (UTC) FILETIME=[6692E270:01C75469] X-imss-version: 2.046 X-imss-result: Passed X-imss-approveListMatch: *@turkcell.com.tr X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: cenk.tasdan@turkcell.com.tr (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern, We determined that the site with domainname; http://www.qahve.com/ is hosting at your servers : -------------------------------------------------------- C:\>nslookup www.qahve.com Server: xxxx Address: x.x.x.x Non-authoritative answer: Name: qahve.com Address: 216.40.227.100 Aliases: www.qahve.com ----------------------------------------------- - From arin.net whois database - Parent: NET-216-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.EV1SERVERS.NET NameServer: NS2.EV1SERVERS.NET Comment: ADDRESSES WITHIN THIS BLOCK ARE NON-PORTABLE RegDate: 2000-10-05 Updated: 2006-11-28 RAbuseHandle: ABUSE477-ARIN RAbuseName: Abuse Department RAbusePhone: +1-713-579-2850 RAbuseEmail: abuse@ev1servers.net -------------------------------------------------- This website is using our offical logo for their malicious propose, which isnot acceptable by our company policies. We are expecting you to behave in a professional and ethical manner, and get the best reaction as soon as possible. Thanks in advance for your cooperation, For see more information about Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri A.S. please see : www.turkcell.com Cenk Tasdan Data Network Resource Management / Security Turkcell ************************************************************************ Bu elektronik posta ve onunla iletilen butun dosyalar sadece gondericisi tarafindan almasi amaclanan yetkili gercek ya da tuzel kisinin kullanimi icindir. Eger soz konusu yetkili alici degilseniz bu elektronik postanin icerigini aciklamaniz, kopyalamaniz, yonlendirmeniz ve kullanmaniz kesinlikle yasaktir ve bu elektronik postayi derhal silmeniz gerekmektedir. TURKCELL bu mesajin icerdigi bilgilerin dogrulugu veya eksiksiz oldugu konusunda herhangi bir garanti vermemektedir. Bu nedenle bu bilgilerin ne sekilde olursa olsun iceriginden, iletilmesinden, alinmasindan ve saklanmasindan sorumlu degildir. Bu mesajdaki gorusler yalnizca gonderen kisiye aittir ve TURKCELLin goruslerini yansitmayabilir Bu e-posta bilinen butun bilgisayar viruslerine karsi taranmistir. ************************************************************************ This e-mail and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. This e-mail has been scanned for all known computer viruses. ************************************************************************ MIME element (text/html)
